body_html: Thank you for comment @jubjamie .i am referring to transfer learning in tensorflow for Inception v3 model.In the retrain.py file a bottlenck_tensor is added after the final layer (pool_3) as pool_3/_reshape:0 .My question will tenosrflow retraining support if i alter the retrain.py file .for e.g remove the reshape layer being added for retraining?

body: Thank you for comment @jubjamie .i am referring to transfer learning in tensorflow for Inception v3 model.In the retrain.py file a bottlenck_tensor is added after the final layer (pool_3) as pool_3/_reshape:0 .My question will tenosrflow retraining support if i alter the retrain.py file .for e.g remove the reshape layer being added for retraining?
